Button.name: Button
Button.description: A versatile button component with multiple variants and sizes.

props.name: width
props.description: Fixed width (prevents layout shift during loading)

props.name: radius
props.description: Border radius (uses theme radius keys or custom value)

props.name: expandedWidth
props.description: Make button take full width of container

props.name: loading
props.description: Loading state - button maintains its width

Icon.name: Icon
Icon.description: Renders icons from the Lucide icon library with theme integration.

props.name: name
props.type: string; // Use string for prop, IconName for intellisense hints

props.name: color
props.description: Color from palette or custom CSS color

props.name: selected
props.description: Currently selected value in the group (use with bind:selected)

props.name: label
props.description: Label text for the radio button

props.name: placeholder
props.description: Placeholder text when no value selected

props.name: color
props.description: Text color from palette or custom

props.name: size
props.description: Font weight override Font size override

props.name: maxLines
props.description: Truncate with ellipsis after n lines (0 = no truncation)

ThemeProvider.name: ThemeProvider
ThemeProvider.description: Provides theme context to all child components. Wrap your app with this component to enable theming. Also generates CSS custom properties for all theme colors.

props.name: config
props.description: Theme configuration - only override what you need

Box.name: Box
Box.description: A fundamental layout container with extensive styling options. The most versatile building block for creating layouts.
Box.example:
<Box bg="surface" padding="m" radius="m">
Content goes here
</Box>

props.name: bg
props.description: Background color from palette or custom CSS (supports gradients)

props.name: padding
props.description: Padding - single value or [vertical, horizontal] or [top, right, bottom, left]

props.name: margin
props.description: Margin - single value or [vertical, horizontal] or [top, right, bottom, left]

props.name: shadow
props.description: Box shadow level or custom shadow

Column.name: Column
Column.description: Vertical layout container that arranges children in a column.

Expanded.name: Expanded
Expanded.description: A widget that expands to fill available space in a Row or Column. Similar to flex-grow in CSS.

props.name: columns
props.description: Number of columns or grid-template-columns value

props.name: rows
props.description: Number of rows or grid-template-rows value

props.name: gap
props.description: Gap between grid items (uses theme spacing)

props.name: alignItems
props.description: Align items along the block axis

props.name: justifyItems
props.description: Justify items along the inline axis

props.name: minItemWidth
props.description: Align the grid within the container Justify the grid within the container Minimum item width for auto-fit/auto-fill columns

props.name: autoFill
props.description: Use auto-fill instead of auto-fit for responsive columns

Stack.name: Stack
Stack.description: Positions children on top of each other (z-axis stacking). All children are positioned absolutely within the stack.

props.name: align
props.description: Alignment of children within the stack

Animate.name: Animate
Animate.description: Powerful entry/exit animation component using IntersectionObserver. Animate elements when they enter or leave the viewport with preset or custom animations.
Animate.example:
<Animate animation="fadeUp" duration={500}>
<Card>Animated content</Card>
</Animate>

<Animate animation="scale" once>
<Text>Animates only once</Text>
</Animate>

props.name: animation
props.description: Animation preset or custom animation name

props.name: scale
props.description: Scale factor for scale animations (0-1 for shrink, >1 for grow)

props.name: exitAnimation
props.description: Exit animation (defaults to reverse of entry)

props.name: once
props.description: Only animate once (won't re-animate when scrolling back)

props.name: startVisible
props.description: Start with element visible (animates out on scroll)

props.name: feedback
props.description: Feedback content shown while dragging (defaults to children)

props.name: data
props.description: Data to pass to drop targets

props.name: visible
props.description: Whether the focus ring is visible

props.name: radius
props.description: Border radius (inherits from parent if not set)

props.name: shortcuts
props.description: Map of key combinations to handlers. Format: "ctrl+s", "shift+enter", "escape"

props.name: global
props.description: Listen globally (window) instead of just when focused

props.name: preventDefault
props.description: Prevent default behavior for matched shortcuts

props.name: unfocusKey
props.description: Key to unfocus the keyboard listener

props.name: center
props.description: Center ripple instead of from click point

props.name: radius
props.description: Border radius (uses theme radius keys or custom value)

props.name: center
props.description: Center ripple instead of from click point

props.name: radius
props.description: Border radius (uses theme radius keys or custom value)

props.name: closing
props.description: Whether the overlay is closing (for animation)

Visible.name: Visible
Visible.description: Detects when element enters/leaves the viewport using IntersectionObserver. Useful for lazy loading, animations on scroll, and tracking visibility.
Visible.example:
console.log('visible!')}> {#snippet children({ isVisible, ratio })}
{isVisible ? 'In view!' : 'Scroll to see me'}
{/snippet}

props.name: showAfter
props.description: Show after scrolling this many pixels

Badge.name: Badge
Badge.description: Small status indicator that can display counts or dots. Supports both theme palette colors and custom colors.
Badge.example:
<Badge content={5} color="error">
<Icon name="Bell" />
</Badge>

<Badge dot color="#00ff00">
<Avatar />
</Badge>

<Badge inline content="New" color="primary" />

props.name: color
props.description: Badge color (palette key or custom CSS color)

props.name: max
props.description: Maximum number to show (shows "99+" if exceeded)

props.name: hideWhenEmpty
props.description: Hide badge when content is 0 or empty

props.name: show
props.description: Show badge (can be used to conditionally hide)

props.name: inline
props.description: Use inline positioning instead of overlay

props.name: maxItems
props.description: Maximum items to show (collapsed if exceeded)

props.name: triggerOnHover
props.description: Open on hover instead of click

props.name: relative
props.description: Position relative to parent instead of screen

props.name: siblingCount
props.description: Number of page buttons to show

props.name: lines
props.description: Number of lines for text variant

props.name: layout
props.description: Which side has the primary content
